message.body: How's the car, how are you today?
Hey! Thanks for asking! Just needed a new battery, so it's fine! I'm feeling much better. How are you?
(1/2) Good to hear!! I'm fine, went to the psychic last night, interesting but I'm not sold on him. Talked to Randy, just chatted, nothing mentioned. Like I
(2/2) said, no answer is an answer for me. I refuse to bring it up.
I don't know. Just don't feel I should have to bring it up.
Well, then you may never get your answer. Don't create more drama where there's already tension by playing chicken with who brings it up first.
Humm, I guess I don't want to hear the answer if he won't just say it.
Maybe. I just know that I would be going crazy over the lack of response and would just want an answer, good or bad.
I'm there! So maybe that's what I need to do but damn its hard!
Yeah, but it will be a relief! You've lived through much more difficult situations!
So true, I'll keep you posted. Xoxoxo
John got us rooms near Union Sq. For April 6!
